Copy the correct 123Scan plug-in for your scanner to your phone:
1. Load 123Scan onto a Windows computer from:
2. From your Windows PC with 123Scan, access your scanners plug-in (.scnplg file) from C:\\ProgramData\\123Scan2\\Plug-ins
3. Put a copy of the plug-in into your phone\'s download folder (Device Storage > Download)
Start the firmware update by clicking the \"Update Firmware\" button:
Navigate to \"Settings > About Phone > Status > Bluetooth Address\" or
Then write down the Bluetooth address.
Hit back button until return to this screen.

1.\tTurn the RFD8500 on and ensure Bluetooth is enabled.

\tThe RFD8500 is discoverable over Bluetooth for 40 seconds after start up. After that time Bluetooth suspends and is no longer discoverable. To make discoverable again, press the Bluetooth button, located on side of RFD8500.
3.\tThe Android device will discover the RFD8500 and display it on the Bluetooth Devices list.
4.\tTap the RFD8500 to initiate pairing from the Bluetooth Devices list.
5.\tPress the RFD8500 trigger to complete pairing when the Bluetooth LED starts flashing fast.
6.\tLaunch the Scanner Control app / Menu / Available Device List and select the RFD8500.
Scan a sample barcode from the list below, or scan your own barcode.
